attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heinz have recently purchased the rights to make HP Sauce - a British icon. However, they have stated that they are closing down the Birmingham factory and moving production to Holland. We need to keep HP Sauce in Britain!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep HP Sauce In Britain."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12063.asp

Prime Minister's Office
